= Introduction =

Summary of the article "Modeling attention to salient proto-objects", Dirk Walther, Christof Koch


= Details =

== Abstract == 

How can we attend to objects before they are recognized ?
So-called proto-objects form volatile units of visual information can be accessed by selective attention and subsequently validated objects.
Propose a biologically plausible model of forming and attending to proto-objects in natural scenes
